column5: Dr. Salvelinus and myself headed up north to enjoy the beautiful sunny weather we had on Friday. The river was looking really nice.        As I was setting up my float rod in typical fashion on his 2nd cast I hear "Fish on". His namesake showed up.    Such nice colors.    We drifted roe and marabou jigs and enjoyed the sun and finally some superior steel.      I can't think of a better way to enjoy a hot spring day.
That pool your fishing looks absolutely perfect! Matched with some sun, mild temps and a friend to enjoy it all with...you have got to love it.
That area you are fishing is a blessed spot on this world. Enjoy your fishing, I enjoyed your post. It's nice to dream for a few seconds!
it was so hot out, kinger decided to fill his waders with water...    great day all around...and pretty crazy that fish was chrome despite being as far as it was from lake superior.

Nice...my son and his buddy were going up there this morning and figured they could go out and party a bit last night abd then go fishing in the morning. They are both still in bed.  Is that the ...........
it's not really my style to broadcast where i fish on a public form.  if you don't know that yet, you haven't been paying attention.

Nice work boys! Mixed bag of chrome and brookies is always nice. What a weekend we are having. I havent fished much this weekend but its game on starting tomorrow for a few days... We just installed a Garmin 400c in my cousins boat and are about to begin installing a 70# minnkota bow mount this week sometime. I havent posted a report in sometime so I'll work on getting one up for the board soon.  Next weekend the rivers will be in prime conditions by the looks of things....    TDunn
I can't wait to hit the rivers after this rain we FINALLY got.  I definitely needed a little water in my waders to deal with the heat!
Gorgeous water boys, the fish are just a bonus.
And raining like a son of a gun again now. Smelts are gonna be on.
you're thinking about smelts right now? jesus! i have ALL of my lines tied for tomorrow already.  watch out chromers!
I don't have a government job. I have to work tomorrow.  I need people to go get me a feed of smelts and more important...a whole bunch of lake trout, pike and whitefish bait

my buddy went last night for smelts went out 12-6am and got half a bucket then i picked him up at 7am and went pike fishing all day haha! he slept both ways in the truck he has to be past out right now lol
